title: rounded Myriad - various {gang}
content:
Newbie member question, so apologies if its been answered before.   
   
Is there a rounded version of the myriad font family?.   
   
Thats it!   
TIA
author: mesh606

comments.content:
IIRC, no.   
There are two decorative 'cuts' of Myriad, though.   
Myriad Sketch and Myriad Tilt (see them [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20111221030840/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/myriad/)).

I don't know if you are thinking of another family which Slimbach designed by himself. [Cronos](http://web.archive.org/web/20111221030840/http:/www.veer.com/results.asp?Image=ADT0002942) is softly rounded, but very different from Myriad.
You could also look at Gerard Unger

Praxis 2 seems to be the way forward.   
   
Thanks guys
I don't know if you could consider [FF Info](http://web.archive.org/web/20111221030840/http:/www.philsfonts.com/showing.html?sku=FF011193X1P1&start=1)?
